TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerNameRegistration extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerNameRegistration Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
type PeerNameRegistration = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: Registers a in a or set of clouds.

span.span: Registers a in a or set of clouds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊建立 （或更新） 與相關聯的所有資訊等雲端或雲端中。Registration creates (or updates) all the information that is associated with a in a peer cloud or clouds. 它是可能有多個相同的對等名稱的物件。It is possible to have multiple objects for the same peer name. 在此情況下，如果受保護的對等名稱，每個執行個體代表不同的雲端中。In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance represents in a different cloud. 不過，如果不安全的對等名稱，可以使用註冊相同的雲端中多次，提供每個註冊從不同的處理序。However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times, providing that each registration is from a different process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回類型的新預設執行個體。Returns a new default instance of type . 它不會在建構期間執行對等名稱註冊。It does not perform peer name registration during construction. 具有這個建構函式的物件之後，呼叫端應填入之前呼叫的執行個體中的適當欄位或。After instantiating an object with this constructor, the caller should populate the appropriate fields in the instance prior to calling or .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and port number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個建構函式會建立將用來註冊所有來源位址 (這兩個 IPv4 IPv6and) 執行個體和對等目前參與的所有雲端提供的通訊埠。Calling this constructor creates an instance that will be used to register all source addresses (both IPv6and IPv4) and the provided port for all clouds in which the peer is currently participating. 如果成功，建構物件指定和會填入。If the object is constructed successfully, the specified and are populated. 如果對等名稱安全的而且先前已登錄在對等電腦目前參與，就會擲回。If the peer name is secured and was previously registered in a the peer is currently participating in, an is thrown. 這個建構函式只會建立執行個體; 不會執行註冊。This constructor only creates a instance; it does not perform the registration. 應用程式必須呼叫這個建構函式的註冊物件具現化並擴展其欄位之後,執行實際的註冊。After instantiating the registration object with this constructor and populating its fields, the application must call to perform the actual registration.

summary.span: Releases the resources used by the object.

span.span: Releases the resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當對等離開，不再需要雲端對等相關聯的物件。When a peer leaves a , the cloud no longer requires the object associated with the peer. 註冊物件是否已停止或處置是依存於雲端將會重複使用要註冊此對等或另一個對等的物件。Whether the registration object is stopped or disposed is dependent upon whether the cloud will reuse the object to register this peer or another peer. 如果有任何其他端點需要通訊等的主應用程式與註冊物件內，雲端中註冊這些端點必須先停止或處置這個物件。If there are any other endpoint(s) within the registration object with which the peer host expected to communicate, registering those endpoints within the cloud must occur before stopping or disposing of this object. 如果雲端需要註冊多個對等，建議方法，則當雲端不再需要記憶體時，應該傳回至作業系統，透過方法。If the cloud expects to register more peers, the method is recommended; when the cloud no longer needs the memory, it should be returned to the operating system via the method.

summary.span: Gets the collection of network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.

span.span: Gets the collection of network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.

value.span: 包含相關聯的對等名稱的已註冊的網路端點的物件。

span.span: An object that contains the network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.

value.span: 除非明確指定，否則所有屬性的預設值是參考類型。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在命名空間，網路端點表示成 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。In the namespace, an represents a network endpoint as an IP address and a port number. 如需 PNRP，IP 位址和連接埠值必須提供每個端點。For PNRP, an IP address and port value must be provided for each endpoint. 端點可提供最大數目為 10。The maximum number of endpoints that can be provided is ten. 如果這個參數，便會使用自動位址選取`null`。Automatic address selection is used when this parameter is `null`. 如果註冊方法，會自動選取要登錄的位址，則沒有任何方法可以判斷的 theaddresses 的已註冊的對等名稱。If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine theaddresses for which the peer name was registered. 也就是說，屬性將不會更新以反映選取的位址。That is, the property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected. 針對多個節點，「 對等名稱註冊時每個不同而每個註冊執行個體上定義的屬性將會不同。When a peer name is registered for more than one node, each is distinct and the property defined on each registration instance will be different. 也，當註冊多個、 每個註冊是相異和端點的集合，通常會每個執行個體不同。Also, when a is registered into more than one , each registration is distinct and the collection of endpoints will usually be different for each instance.

span.para: 此對等體將與其通訊的端點清單是不相同的端點的已知這個對等名稱，清單會以不同方式儲存。
The list of endpoints with which this peer will communicate is not the same as the list of endpoints by which this peer name is known, which is stored differently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 對等名稱可以註冊多個節點。每個執行個體並不相同。A peer name can be registered for more than one node; each instance is distinct. 各有一個對應相關聯的屬性是不同的執行個體。The property associated with each corresponding instance is different. 此外，就可以註冊多個節點都會連接到; 的雲端的對等名稱每個這些註冊並不相同。Also, it is possible to register a peer name for more than one cloud that the node is connected to; each of these registrations is distinct. 對等名稱將會在每一個執行個體不同。The peer name's will be different in each of these instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會註冊中指定的對等名稱屬性與所有的來源位址和建構函式中指定。The method registers the peer name specified in the property with all source addresses and the specified in the constructor. 只有當沒有指定端點時，預設通訊埠正由這個方法。The default port is used by this method only when no endpoints are specified. 如果屬性是`null`，這個方法會註冊中指定的對等名稱屬性使用欄位，預設值，初始化， ，和.If the property is `null`, this method registers the peer name specified in the property using the field, which initializes default values for the , , and . 之後物件已經啟動，方法用來將它停止。After a object has been started, the method is used to stop it. 若要更新的註冊，必須使用的方法。To update a registration, the method must be used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並註冊以及指定的中繼資料。The following code example creates a and registers it along with the metadata specified. [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPRegisterPeerName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPRegisterPeerName/CS/RegisterPeerName.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: Unregisters the peer name specified in the property from all the clouds in which it was registered.

span.span: Unregisters the peer name specified in the property from all the clouds in which it was registered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊程序停止之後，註冊物件的狀態等於狀態的預設建構函式建構之後。After the registration process has been stopped, the registration object's state is equal to the state directly after being constructed by the default constructor. 處於此狀態，會假設其所有屬性沒有值。In this state, all of its properties are assumed to have no value. 方法可用來重新啟動它。The method may be used to restart it. 很可能有相同的對等名稱的多個註冊物件。It is possible to have multiple registration objects for the same peer name. 在這種情況下，如果受保護的對等名稱，則每個執行個體將代表不同的 PNRP cloud 中的註冊。In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance will represent a registration in a different PNRP cloud. 不過，如果不安全的對等名稱，它可以註冊相同的雲端中多次。However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times. 如果這個執行個體已停止，呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。If this instance is already stopped, calling this method has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個註冊 cloud 中的所有資訊完全會捨棄在呼叫之前。All information registered in cloud(s) for this prior to the call is completely discarded. 新的資料不會與現有的註冊結合。The new data is not combined with the existing registration. 若要更新，第一次更新此執行個體上的屬性，並接著呼叫這個方法。To update a , first update the properties on this instance and then call this method. 之後註冊，無法更新屬性。After a is registered, the property cannot be updated. 記錄中的所有其他欄位可能會更新。All other fields in the record may be updated.

span.span: if automatic endpoint selection is to be used; if some other method will be used to determine an endpoint.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自動端點選取項目時 (這個屬性設定為`true`) 在開始之前指定任何端點資訊，系統會選擇個別的端點，並將其與相關聯的對等名稱發行到所有可用雲端。When auto endpoint selection is used (this property is set to `true`) with no endpoint information specified prior to the start of a , the system chooses individual endpoints and publishes them with the associated peer name into all available clouds. 如果未指定連接埠，會自動選取項目選擇零做為。If the port is not specified, auto selection chooses zero as the . 當設定為`false`，不會執行自動選取上面所述。When set to `false`, auto selection as described above is not performed. 這可讓登錄程序來發佈 「 對等名稱，以及資料 blob (依指定屬性)。This enables the registration process to publish a peer name along with a data blob (as specified by the property). 沒有端點相關聯的名稱。No endpoints are associated with the name. 如果註冊方法，會自動選取要登錄的位址，則沒有任何方法可以判斷哪些位址的物件已登錄。If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine what addresses for which the object was registered. 也就是說，屬性將不會更新以反映選取的位址。That is, the property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected. 啟動對等名稱登錄之後，更新此屬性沒有任何作用。Updating this property after peer name registration has started has no effect.
